DataElement.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem V2.0 Past Week Health Problems Affect Ability to do Regular Daily Activities other than Work at Job Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response of how much their health problems affected their ability to do regular daily activities, other than work at a job, in the past seven days, using an 11 point visual analogue scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem Past Week Health Problems Affect Ability to do Regular Daily Activities other than Work at Job Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure the effect of a limited or local physical or emotional problem or symptom on an individual’s ability to work and perform regular activities. It measures absenteeism, presenteeism, as well as impairments in unpaid activity because of a health problem.:The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about how much an individual's health problems affects or affected their ability to do regular daily activities other than work at a job._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure the effect of a limited or local physical or emotional problem or symptom on an individual’s ability to work and perform regular activities. It measures absenteeism, presenteeism, as well as impairments in unpaid activity because of a health problem.

Concepts.longName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to measure the effect of a limited or local physical or emotional problem or symptom on an individual’s ability to work and perform regular activities. It measures absenteeism, presenteeism, as well as impairments in unpaid activity because of a health problem.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Health Problems Affect Ability to do Regular Daily Activities other than Work at Job Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about how much an individual's health problems affects or affected their ability to do regular daily activities other than work at a job.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Health Problems Affect Ability to do Regular Daily Activities other than Work at Job
Concepts.definition: A question about how much an individual's health problems affects or affected their ability to do regular daily activities other than work at a job.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: WPAI-GH:Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire-General Health V2.0. Reilly MC, Zbrozek AS, Dukes EM., 1993.
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study CC003 in Rave per request by R.Bonanni. mc 8/28/15

ValueDomain.preferredName: WPAI Effect of Health Problems on Daily Activities 11 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used in the Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire with values ranging from 0: Health problems had no effect on my daily activities to 10: Health problems completely prevented me from doing my daily activities.
